DOC.brief_summary: A study to evaluate the effects of etoricoxib and indomethacin in the treatment of acute gout.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluating the Effect of Etoricoxib and Indomethacin in the Treatment of Acute Gout (0663-081)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Males or females at least 18 years of age who have acute gout.
